Hexxagon.View

Class FaceBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.mvc.TView
      • Hexxagon.View.FaceBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFaceBoard, IView

    public class FaceBoard
extends TView
implements IFaceBoard
    Instance of this class realises an bulb face of game as a JavaFX specific graphical node.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey
